name: Mercenary
description: Coin has been your creed, contracts your scripture. You have fought for causes not your own, and lived to tell the tale.

feature.name: Mercenary Contacts
feature.description: You know how to find mercenary work and can make contacts in sellsword companies. You can identify mercenary bands by their insignia and know their reputations.

traits.text: I talk about past battles constantly.
I size up everyone I meet as a potential threat.
I have a dark sense of humor.
I am always calm, even in crisis.
I negotiate everything, even small purchases.
I never let my guard down.
I keep count of my kills.

ideals.text: Loyalty. My comrades are my family.
Coin. Gold speaks louder than honor.
Survival. The living collect the pay.
Independence. I answer to no king or lord.
Might. The strong determine what is right.

bonds.text: I will never abandon my companions.
Someone I served with saved my life.
I hunt the one who betrayed my company.
I keep a trophy from my greatest victory.
I send coin home to someone I care about.
A former employer owes me, and I will collect.

flaws.text: I drink or gamble to forget what I've done.
I hold grudges and never forgive.
Violence is always my first solution.
I will do anything for the right price.
